info.title: Apify
info.description: Use Apify to run web scrapers and AI agents, manage Actors and tasks, schedule and monitor runs, retrieve datasets and results, and trigger flows from webhooks. Enable end-to-end data collection, enrichment, and automation in your workflows.

get.description: Returns information about the current user account, including both public and private information.
Fetches a list of recently used Actors.
Fetches a list of Actors from the Apify store.
Fetches a list of Actors from recently used Actors or from Apify store based on scope for dropdown selection.

parameters.name: actorScope
parameters.description: Please select the source to search Actors from.

post.description: Runs an Actor and immediately returns without waiting for the run to finish. To wait for the run to finish, use the waitForFinish query parameter. See docs: https://docs.apify.com/api/v2/act-runs-post.

parameters.name: actorScope
parameters.description: Please select the source to search Actors from.

parameters.name: actorId
parameters.description: Actor identifier to run. Supply Actor ID.

parameters.name: inputBody
parameters.description: Raw JSON object passed as INPUT to the Actor.

schema.description: Raw JSON object passed as INPUT to the Actor.

get.description: Fetches a list of the user's Actor tasks.

post.description: Runs an Actor task and immediately returns without waiting for the run to finish. To wait for the run to finish, use the waitForFinish query parameter. See docs: https://docs.apify.com/api/v2/actor-task-runs-post.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: Task identifier to run.

parameters.name: inputOverride
parameters.description: A raw JSON object to override the task's default input.

schema.description: A raw JSON object to override the task's default input.

get.description: Fetches a list of the user's datasets.
Fetches one item from a dataset to infer the schema.

parameters.name: datasetId
parameters.description: Dataset ID.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set limit to 1 for schema inference.

schema.description: An OpenAPI schema object representing a single dataset item. The schema may include a wrapper if the sample isn't an object.

get.description: Retrieves items from one of your Apify datasets with optional pagination parameters.

parameters.name: datasetId
parameters.description: Select the dataset from which to retrieve items.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to be returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of items to skip from the beginning of the list.

post.description: Scrapes a single URL using the Web Scraper Actor. This action starts an asynchronous scrape and returns the run details immediately. Use the Actor run finished trigger to process results once the scrape is complete.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The full URL of the single page to be scraped. Must be a valid URL format (e.g., https://example.com).

parameters.name: crawler_type
parameters.description: Select the crawling engine to use for scraping the page.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Timeout for the run in seconds.

get.description: Fetches a list of the user's key-value stores.
Fetches a list of keys for a specific key-value store.
Fetches a record from a key-value store to infer the schema.

parameters.name: recordKey
parameters.description: Select the key from which to retrieve the record.

200.description: Key-value store record schema inferred successfully.

schema.description: An OpenAPI schema object representing a key-value store record. The schema may include a wrapper if the sample isn't an object.

get.description: Gets a value stored in the key-value store under a specific key.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: Select the key-value store from which to retrieve the record.

parameters.name: recordKey
parameters.description: Select the key from which to retrieve the record.

Content-Type.description: The MIME type of the record's content.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Payload received from Apify when the webhook fires.

post.description: Creates a webhook to subscribe to Actor run events. Triggers when the selected Actor run finishes with a specific status. See docs: https://docs.apify.com/api/v2/webhooks-post.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Webhook subscription configuration including the callback URL and statuses.

eventTypes.description: Actor run statuses to trigger on.

actorId.description: Actor identifier to monitor. Supply Actor ID.

parameters.name: actorScope
parameters.description: Please select the source to search Actors from.

parameters.name: webhookId
parameters.description: The ID of the webhook to delete.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Payload received from Apify when the task webhook fires.

post.description: Creates a webhook to subscribe to Actor task run events. Triggers when the selected Actor task run finishes with a specific status. See docs: https://docs.apify.com/api/v2/webhooks-post.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Webhook subscription configuration for task run events including the callback URL and statuses.

eventTypes.description: Actor run statuses to trigger on.

actorTaskId.description: Please select the Actor task to monitor for events.

delete.description: Deletes an existing task webhook subscription.

parameters.name: webhookId
parameters.description: The ID of the task webhook to delete.

ErrorResponseSchema.x-ms-summary: Represents an error response from the Apify API

ActorRunResponseSchema.description: Complete information about an executed Actor run.

id.description: Unique identifier of the Actor run.

actId.description: Unique identifier of the Actor that was executed.

userId.description: Unique identifier of the user who owns the Actor run.

actorTaskId.description: Unique identifier of the Actor task (if the run was started from a task).

startedAt.description: Timestamp when the Actor run started.

finishedAt.description: Timestamp when the Actor run finished.

status.description: Status of the Actor run (e.g., SUCCEEDED, FAILED, RUNNING, ABORTED).

statusMessage.description: Detailed status message from the Actor run, including processing summary and results.

isStatusMessageTerminal.description: Whether the status message is terminal (final) or may change during the run.

meta.description: Additional metadata about the Actor run, including origin and user agent information.

pricingInfo.description: Detailed pricing information including pricing model, events, and cost breakdown.

stats.description: Performance statistics including runtime, memory usage, CPU usage, and network traffic.

chargedEventCounts.description: Count of billable events that occurred during the Actor run.

options.description: Configuration options used for the Actor run (memory, timeout, build version, etc.).

buildId.description: Unique identifier of the Actor build used for this run.

exitCode.description: Exit code returned by the Actor process (0 indicates success).

defaultKeyValueStoreId.description: Unique identifier of the default key-value store associated with this run.

defaultDatasetId.description: Unique identifier of the default dataset where the Actor stored its results.

defaultRequestQueueId.description: Unique identifier of the default request queue used by the Actor.

buildNumber.description: Build number of the Actor version used for this run.

containerUrl.description: URL of the container where the Actor run was executed.

isContainerServerReady.description: Whether the container server is ready and accessible.

gitBranchName.description: Name of the Git branch used for this Actor run (if applicable).

usageTotalUsd.description: Total cost of the Actor run in USD.

WebhookPayloadSchema.description: Event payload sent by webhook when an Actor run finishes.

userId.description: ID of the user who owns the resource associated with the event.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the event occurred.

eventType.description: The type of the event that triggered the webhook (e.g., ACTOR.RUN.SUCCEEDED).

actorRunId.description: ID of the specific Actor run that triggered the event.

StoreIdParameter.name: storeId
StoreIdParameter.description: Select the key-value store from which to retrieve the record.

TimeoutParameter.name: timeout
TimeoutParameter.description: Timeout for the run in seconds.

BuildOrTagParameter.name: build
BuildOrTagParameter.description: Actor build to run (tag or build number). Typically it's the 'latest'.

ActorScopeParameter.name: actorScope
ActorScopeParameter.description: Only used by the connector UI to trigger list refresh when scope changes.

WaitForFinishParameter.name: waitForFinish
WaitForFinishParameter.description: Wait for the run to finish in seconds (0–60).

MemoryParameter.name: memory
MemoryParameter.description: Memory limit in MB (power of 2, min 128).

LimitDropdownParameter.name: limit
LimitDropdownParameter.description: Maximum number of Actors to return.

OnRunSucceededParameter.name: onRunSucceeded
OnRunSucceededParameter.description: Trigger when an Actor run succeeds. Defaults to false if not set.

OnRunFailedParameter.name: onRunFailed
OnRunFailedParameter.description: Trigger when an Actor run fails. Defaults to false if not set.

OnRunTimedOutParameter.name: onRunTimedOut
OnRunTimedOutParameter.description: Trigger when an Actor run times out. Defaults to false if not set.

OnRunAbortedParameter.name: onRunAborted
OnRunAbortedParameter.description: Trigger when an Actor run is aborted. Defaults to false if not set.

schema.x-ms-summary: Represents information about the authenticated Apify user.

pictureUrl.description: URL to the user's profile picture.

websiteUrl.description: URL to the user's personal website.

schema.description: Response containing a list of datasets with pagination information.

RecordKeysListResponse.description: List of record keys retrieved successfully.

schema.description: Response containing a list of record keys from a key-value store.

KeyValueStoresListResponse.description: List of key-value stores retrieved successfully.

schema.description: Response containing a list of key-value stores.

TasksListResponse.description: List of Actor tasks retrieved successfully.

schema.description: Response containing a list of Actor tasks.

ActorsDropdownResponse.description: List of Actors for dropdown retrieved successfully.

schema.description: Response containing a list of Actors for dropdown selection.

StoreActorsListResponse.description: List of Actors from Apify store retrieved successfully.

schema.description: Response containing a list of Actors from the Apify store.

RecentlyUsedActorsListResponse.description: List of recently used Actors retrieved successfully.

schema.description: Response containing a list of recently used Actors with pagination information.
Response from webhook creation containing the webhook ID.

id.description: Unique identifier of the created webhook.

tags.name: KeyValueStores
tags.description: Operations related to Apify key-value stores.
